name: zoomabletimeline
description: A D3 plugin that is a zoomable timeline.
author: Jamie Williams

scripts.dostuff: node -e 'process.stdout.write("var version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\";export * from \"../index\"; export {version};");' > build/bundle.js
scripts.rollup: rollup -f umd -u timeline -n timeline -o build/timeline.js -- build/bundle.js
scripts.pretest: mkdir -p build && npm run dostuff && npm run rollup && cp build/timeline.js ../../js/timeline.js
scripts.build: rm -f build/timeline.zip && zip -j build/timeline.zip -- LICENSE README.mdbuild/timeline.js build/timeline.min.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && npm run uglify && npm run build
